list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: any of a number of shrubs and other plants with dark green glossy leaves.
an aromatic evergreen shrub related to the bay tree, several kinds of which form forests in tropical and warm countries.
bestow an award or praise on (someone) in recognition of an achievement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she will be laureled alongside politicians, historians, and other actors
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô sẽ bị nguyền rủa cùng với các chính trị gia, nhà sử học và các diễn viên khác
